name: Universidad Carlos III de Madrid
description: The UC3M was founded in 1989 to provide society with an efficient and high quality public service, offering an integral education model within the global concept of science and culture. It covers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate degrees in both the technical and humanistic fields, being internationally renowed for its success in business studies. Approximately 1,600 faculty members provide education to more than 18,000  students at the three UC3M campuses.
